post:
The final BF offer from Inception Hosting

50% off on Quarterly, Semi-annual and Annual terms.

**UK SSD cached KVM.**
Nodes: E5-2640v4, DDR4, SAS Raid 10 (8 disk) + 2 x Samsung 960 Pro's in hardware cachecade (read+write cache)

Packages available:

* RAM: From 512mb to 6GB
* DISK: From 10GB to 120GB
* BW: 500GB to 4TB

Additional IP's = 1 Free on plans with 3GB Ram+

All plans benefit from DDOS protection and free Direct Admin licenses (on request)

Coupon Code: BF2019-KVMUK
Product Links: https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?gid=27

Depending on the mix bought this could last a very short amount of time, it is limited quantity.
